ygData.subject: Zakrul the Travler has arrived
ygData.msgSnippet: Allow me to introduce myself, I am Zakrul the Travler, Wizard of some talent.  I must say you all sure do go about how great you are but I have never heard of
ygData.messageBody:
Allow me to introduce myself, I am Zakrul the Travler, Wizard of some talent. I

must say you all sure do go about how great you are but I have never heard of
you through any bard songs or even rumor. Well I know that talkers are just
that. So as I travel around Norrath I will stop by to say hello Zardoz in his
elven city. Itan I have yet to see you in my travels and I live in Erudin.
Well I think that is because I am out proving myself adventuring with all sorts
while you two write each other thinly vieled love letters. Well I let my
actions speak for me. If we meet in the future you can be sure to team with me.

We shall then find who is the mightiest. For I work as a team which always nets

the best results.

I the great Zakrul have also decided to extend and invitation to anybody
interested in becoming an officer in The Companions. We are an adventure guild
that is neutral and ultimate goal it to travel the land of Norrath to meet our
fate. If you are interested there are two officer slots open. First come first

serve. We currently have chapters started in Freeport, Qeynos and Erudin and
welcome the chance to start in other cities. Drow, Trolls and Ogres need not
apply.
Farewell,
Zakrul The Travler

OOC: Please email zdogg@... with any interest. I only need 2 more to make
the guild official. If you wish to know more it is posted on EQVault. Hope to
see all of you in Norrath. This newsletter keeps me through work with out going

crazy from EQ withdrawl. Itan and Zardoz you two keep it up tis funny, funny
stuff.

-----------------------------------------------------
This mail sent through IMP: http://web.horde.org/imp/
